name: Ardenfall RPG | Free Demo
description:
Welcome to the World of Ardenfall

Ardenfall is a choice-based RPG set in a world of intricate politics and ancient cultures. Walk in the shoes of a deadly assassin, a grizzled mercenary, a powerful mage, a silver-tongued thief, and anything else your role-playing heart desires. Explore the rain-drenched wetlands and forgotten dungeons full of danger, meeting countless interesting characters with unique dialog and quests along the way. You may start your adventure as a nobody, but the choices you make and connections you form will propel you to fame… or infamy.

Meaningful Character Creation

How you craft your character will have long term consequences - choose your character’s race, attributes, traits, starting faction, and more. These decisions will unlock dialog options, alter your strengths and weaknesses, and even define how others trust (or distrust) your character!

Meet Countless Interesting Characters

Interact with a unique range of characters across the world, each with different perspectives, beliefs, and culture. Building trust with the people of Ardenfall unlocks new paths in your journey - you may however need to charm, convince or lie to get what you desire.

Explore Diverse Mechanics

Choose your weapon. Now choose another. If you are stuck, there’s always more options to get you out of a bind - a throwing potion, a single use spell, or a throwing knife of fire may do the trick. A mage specialized in summoning may spawn a great beast to do their bidding, while a thief may toss a potion of silence on their targets to ensure a clean kill.

Key Features:
  • Deep character customization - choose your gender, race, traits, stats, starting items, and more!
  • Explore an open world full of challenging dungeons and vast forests to gain loot and discover secrets.
  • Interact with interesting characters using Ardenfall's powerful dialog system - make choices depending on your stats, traits, and so much more!
  • Test your skills against interesting and unique monsters. You might die. A lot.
  • Feeling bloodthirsty? Every character in Ardenfall can be killed, even ones that are a part of quests.
  • Quickcast spells, potions, and other weapons to mix up combat. Beware, other characters are just as dynamic!
  • Take advantage of the reputation system and leave your mark on the world - various factions and individuals will react to the choices your character makes.
